voice.no-target-voice-channel: Please join a voice channel to run that command.
voice.bot-cant-speak: Bot unable to speak in the voice channel.

music.invalid-url: No video information returned, please check url.

repeat.no-song-playing: Can't repeat, no song currently playing.

game.invalid-game-size: Sorry, that game size is not valid. Valid sizes are: 32, 64, 128, or 256
game.not-enough-idols: There are not enough idols for a game of that size
game.game-not-ready: Game is still loading after a bot restart. Please check again in a minute.
game.resuming-game: Looks like you already had a game going. Please finish this game before starting another one. <:SeemsBlob:422158571115905034>
game.multi-game-running: There is a multi game already running in the current channel.

suggestion.image-not-square: The suggested image must be a perfect square. Please crop the image and try again.
suggestion.invalid-url: Could not retrieve image from the given url.
suggestion.thanks-for-suggestion:
%s 
Thanks for the suggestion! <:SeemsBlob:422158571115905034>
We'll review it and let you know if we add it to the game.
suggestion.not-png-or-jpeg: Images must be in png or jpg format.
suggestion.invalid-image-size: Invalid image size. Images must between 150x150px and 2000x2000px
suggestion.drive-upload-failed: Upload to google drive failed. Suggestion not accepted and user was not notified. Please try again.
suggestion.could-not-decode: Unable to decode iamge. Suggestion not accepted and user was not notified. Please try again.
suggestion.invalid-group-or-idol: The group and idol names must not contain any double quotes or underscores. Please try again.

refresh.not-bot-owner: Sorry, this command can only be run by the bot owner :(
